attributes.action: Scrap the NHS postcode lottery. Give everyone the same rights and access to treatments
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every week, we see in the media that someone is refused a medicine or treatment just because they live in the wrong postcode. The N in NHS means National. National means everyone who is entitled to get it should get it. Some people have got out loans, remortgaged their homes or ask family to gather enough money to pay for the treatment. A few have actually moved to a property where they can get the relevant treatment for free. We pay too much tax and NI.
